Title: Back into the Action
Description:
All right, the antidote is ready. I'll keep Alia steady. You pour what's in the vial into her mouth.

I hope she will live... we'll need her magic to track down this artifact.
ObjectivesText: Use the Ice Cold Antidote on Alia Sunsoar.
RewardText: You have my thanks... I thought I would die before acquiring this artifact.
